flagsdescription.title: 416.gamess Flags
flagsdescription.header: These are flags that appear in the benchmark sources, categorized as to whether they are portability candidates, mandatory, or forbidden.
flagsdescription.flag: SPEC_CPU is set by the SPEC framework. It is not allowed to undefine this macro.
This macro indicates that the benchmark is compiled for an ILP64 system.
SPEC_CPU_NO_HOLLERITH is set by the SPEC framework. It is not allowed to undefine this macro.
